script.name: Sig.Anarkis.Pirate.Pgs.Killed
script.description: Pirate Guild - Signal : Guild Ship KILLED

line.comment: * Custom KILLED signal for PG ships
* LU Update (Solarahawk): added OCV to ignore list for kill counts
* Restore a new formation if any
* Send a signal attacked to the new leader if needed
* Lets handle the prizes and relations
* Only used if the killer is a player owned
* Owner may forget after a while

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Signal : Guild Ship KILLED
Custom KILLED signal for PG ships
LU Update (Solarahawk): added OCV to ignore list for kill counts
Restore a new formation if any
Send a signal attacked to the new leader if needed
Lets handle the prizes and relations
Only used if the killer is a player owned
Owner may forget after a while
